ds_id: Meta's Voicebox AI Mimics Voices of People, Versatile Speech Generator for Audio Editing@Tech Times@2023-06-19 18:42:10.614105@Meta
data_content: Meta has launched the Voicebox AI, which it claims is a versatile speech generation tool that can generate audio content from text or an existing speech. The tool is also capable of cross-lingual voice generation that can translate audio to six different languages. Voicebox AI is designed to mimic people’s voices, from source samples as short as two seconds long. The tool can support content creation, improve sounds or remove background noises, enhancing Internet and tech applications. Meta said the AI-generated voices are realistic and don't sound robotic.
